articles.author: Stefan Becket, Kaia Hubbard
articles.title: 3 American service members killed and dozens injured in drone attack on base in Jordan, U.S. says - CBS News
articles.description: President Biden blamed the attack that killed American troops in Jordan on "radical Iran-backed militant groups operating in Syria and Iraq" and vowed to respond.
articles.content:
Washington — Three American service members were killed and dozens more were injured in an unmanned aerial drone attack on a base in Jordan on Sunday, President Biden and the U.S. military said.
